Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This item is not just a product; it's an experience designed to enhance your daily life in numerous ways. Considering its exceptional features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, I propose a price of $150 for this remarkable item. I believe this offer reflects its true value and provides you with an opportunity to enjoy its benefits at a fair price. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
